column6:
What is Night Thrasher doing while the New Warriors are trussing up super-villains? Where is he when his teammates are training hard for their next mission? And why is their leader nowhere to be found when the team is evading the clutches of the N.Y.P.D. Costumed Division? Night Thrasher reveals his plan to the New Warriors, but after his frequent disappearances, do they trust him?,2008,3
Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | colorist:Marte Gracia | writer:Kevin Grevioux | penciller (cover):Nic Klein | artist:Paco Medina | inker:Juan Vlasco
